name: Street Sweeper (itch)
description:
The streets of Blocton need a sweepin, but the territorial Vigilantes leave waste behind them and pose a lethal threat to the Street Sweeper.  Sweep the streets by circling the city blocks without losing all your lives to bring Blocton to safety! 

*You may need to click the mouse on the game board before you press "S" to start the game.  Game works best on Mozilla Firefox.
